SimpleDataListSpec.Name: MIMED Affiliation Base Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: A simple data list that returns MIMED affiliation base records
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSimpleList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_UMHSAFFILIATIONBASE ( @AFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID uniqueidentifier = null ) as IF @AFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID is not null BEGIN SELECT ID AS VALUE, UMHSAFFILIATIONBASENAME AS LABEL FROM dbo.USR_UMHS_AFFILIATIONBASE WHERE UMHSAFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID = @AFFILIATIONCATEGORYCODEID ORDER BY UMHSAFFILIATIONBASENAME END
